title: Cloud of Hate
lyrics:
You broke the world that you're not long for
You broke the world we're living in
Opened a crack that you have longed for
The sickness you have always been
Oh cloud of hate

Oh cloud of hate

Oh cloud of hate float me away



Oh cloud of hate

Oh cloud of hate

Oh cloud of hate float me away



You have a dream

A bloody nightmare

For every human that's not you

You scare the kids

I hope you die scared

Of all the kids that know the truth



Oh cloud of hate

Oh cloud of hate

Oh cloud of hate float me away



Oh cloud of love

Give me a shove

Oh cloud of love, oh cloud of hate
